name: Roomers
description:
[WASD] to move the player.

[Mouse Movement] to aim.

[Left Click] to shoot.

Run around and test out the weapons we added, kill a few zombies.

If we had a bit more time, more polish and testing would be done, and some level progression would be added. All the parts are there, like multiple maps, multiple weapons, and multiple enemies.

We made this for the 2021 Datorium Game Jam. The assets are all from https://opengameart.org

Thanks for checking it out!
